tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_data (
  symbol VARCHAR,
  date DATE,
  open_price FLOAT,
  close_price FLOAT,
  high_price FLOAT,
  low_price FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE market_data (
  symbol STRING,
  date DATE,
  open_price DECIMAL,
  high_price DECIMAL,
  low_price DECIMAL,
  close_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE investment_decisions (
  symbol STRING,
  strategy STRING,
  decision_date DATE,
  buy_sell VARCHAR,
  amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(255),
    open_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_info (
    symbol VARCHAR(255),
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry VARCHAR(255),
    headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
    founding_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    open_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    close_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    high_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    low_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE investment_history (
    strategy_id INT,
    date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    action VARCHAR(10),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    market_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol TEXT,
    market_date DATE,
    open_price FLOAT,
    close_price FLOAT,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE investment_history (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id UUID,
    stock_symbol TEXT,
    action TEXT,
    action_date DATE
);
